籤詩版本二:
He paʻakikī loa ka hoʻoikaika ʻana no ka kūleʻa, akā paʻa nā lā o ka hakakā ʻana no ka male.
I ka hopena, e hahau ʻia ʻo ia e ka pua, alakaʻi ke kanaka hanohano i ka poʻe hanohano.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i kahi pōmaikaʻi i ka hūnā.
He pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: Hoʻololi manaʻo. ʻO Enron i ka hopena. Inā ʻoe e nīnau e pili ana i ka hoʻohana. Kokoke wale i ka poe hanohano.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Manaʻo puke ʻo Jiang Wei (Manaʻo puke ʻo Jiang Wei)
ʻO Jiang Wei (202-264), ʻo Boyue ka inoa aloha, he kamaʻāina ʻo ia no Ji County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (ʻo Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gansu Province).
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ua alakaʻi ʻo Kong Ming i kona mau pūʻali mai Qishan Mountain i ʻeono manawa e hoʻouka iā Cao Wei. Ua aʻo ʻo ia i nā mokuna iwakāluakūmāhā o ka Buke Kaua i ka General Jiang Wei, me ka manaʻo e hiki iā ia ke hoʻoili i kāna hoʻoilina.
(ʻO ke ʻano hoʻohālikelike o kēia moʻolelo ʻo Jiang Wei i hoʻoilina no kekahi kumu)
聖意: Aloha ka hale, hele mālie au, ʻimi au i ka waiwai, male au, ʻaʻole i ʻaneʻi ka hele wāwae kāne, aia ka ʻuhe silika i Zhongping, aia nā holoholona ʻeono i Zhongping, ʻimi au i kekahi, pono ka hoʻopiʻi. , Ke neʻe nei au, ua pōmaikaʻi au, ua pōmaikaʻi au, ua maʻi au i nā maʻi Hikina, Laki au i ka lua kupapaʻu ʻo Xingxing Mountain.
古人: Manaʻo Puke iā Jiang Wei (Puke iā Jiang Wei)
第X籤: E kakau inoa ma ka la umikumamakahi
